when_to_use.value: **Unordered lists**: When item sequence doesn't matter
**Ordered lists**: For step-by-step instructions or sequential information requiring specific order
**Definition lists**: To associate terminology with explanations

when_to_consider_else.value: Don't use sub-bullets; convert to separate lists instead
Keep lists under 7 items; use subheadings to break longer lists into digestible sections
For benefit/tool summaries, use [Service list item](/docs/components/service-list-item)
For content needing visual containment, use [Card](/docs/components/card)

content_considerations.value: Introduce lists with full sentences (avoid "the following")
